About

    x

  • NextGenHub is a group of software developers from all spheres of software development, endued with experiences, bright minds and exposure. They are passionate to teach, mentor, guide, and help upcoming developers who are confused, lack mentorship and direction in transversing the development world and finding where they fit. Thus becoming exquisite software developers in no time.
    We are a congregation of creative minds, with the audacity to invent tomorrow and what matters tomorrow! We are growing and ask you to be a part of an empowered generation

  • VISION

    What is our Mission and Vision

    - Empowering tomorrow's leaders with the right tools Fossils power today’s markets and economy…data will power most of what matters tomorrow.

    - To bridge the gap of knowledge, thus producing economic relevant personnel for sustainable development through Technology.

  • Why Join NextGenHub?

    Productivity is prime for the youth, whereas traditional career paths are saturated particularly for the Gen Z demography. It’s evident in the prevailing high unemployment rates the world over. A smart outlet to be your own boss or determinant of your working pattern is to embrace software engineering.
    Knowledge - Expert knowledge on best software practices. Mentoring - Software development journey without a mentor makes it difficult, you gain a lifetime access to a mentor. Exposure - You will be exposed to the possibility that exists and will gain first hand information and opportunities.

  • How we stand Out?

    Our ultimate goal is for you to succeed and we are painstaking about this especially how you grow, given that no two entities spur in the exact same manner, we provide custom mentorship per individual.

    Of Our
    Story!
